name: WundergroundWeatherShow
body:
### The current weather
Temperature | Feels like
------------|-----------
replaceMeTempC | replaceMeFeelslikeC

### How it's done
A cron job is regularly retrieving the weather from Weather Underground (uses bash, wget), extracting some data (uses bash, grep, cut), updating the website and pushing it to GitHub.

### Credits
Christoph Winkler for his blog post [Die Wundergound Weather API â€“ endlich eine brauchbare](http://www.chrisge.org/blog/2013-03-09/wundergound_api)

![Weather Underground logo](http://gflorian.github.io/WundergroundWeatherShow/images/wundergroundLogo_4c_horz_small.png)
Weather Underground for the weather data. Weather Underground is a registered trademark of The Weather Channel, LLC. both in the United States and internationally. The Weather Underground Logo is a trademark of Weather Underground, LLC.

### The code
View it on GitHub: https://github.com/gflorian/WundergroundWeatherShow
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
